title: RISK #stockmarket #investing #trading
text: Got to embrace risk if you are too afraid to take a risk you're gonna have a really hard time getting rich It sounds hokey, but it's exactly the truth. It's a problem I struggled with and what I did to get over it was constantly remind myself I can always make more money. You can't always make new opportunities Equivalent to the one you came across sometimes there's a big opportunity You got to take advantage of it while it's there even though you might be a little bit scared being out there. See you later
